flavor: The ever-watchful center of a growing web of eyes.

foreign_names.flavor: Das wachsame Zentrum eines stets wachsenden Netzwerks aus Beobachtern.
foreign_names.name: Geheiligter Springbrunnen
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {U}.)
Sowie der Geheiligte Springbrunnen ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt er getappt ins Spiel.

foreign_names.flavor: El centro siempre vigilante de una creciente red de ojos.
foreign_names.name: Fuente consagrada
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Agrega {W} o {U}.)
En cuanto la Fuente consagrada entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, entra al campo de batalla girada.

foreign_names.flavor: Le centre toujours alerte d'un réseau d'yeux grandissant.
foreign_names.name: Fontaine sacrée
foreign_names.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {U}.)
Au moment où la Fontaine sacrée arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, elle arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.

foreign_names.flavor: Il centro sempre vigile di una rete di occhi in continua crescita.
foreign_names.name: Fontana Santificata
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {W} o {U}.)
Mentre la Fontana Santificata entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.

foreign_names.flavor: 絶えず監視を続ける、拡大する目の網の中心。
foreign_names.name: 神聖なる泉
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{W}か{U}を加える。）
神聖なる泉が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうしないなら、これはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor: 감시를 늦추지 않는 빛나는 눈들로 만들어진 그물의 정중앙.
foreign_names.name: 신성한 분수대
foreign_names.text:
({T}: {W} 또는 {U}를 추가한다.)
신성한 분수대가 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 신성한 분수대는 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreign_names.flavor: O centro sempre vigilante de uma teia crescente de olhos.
foreign_names.name: Fonte Santificada
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Adicione {W} ou {U}.
Conforme Fonte Santificada entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, ela entrará no campo de batalha virada.

foreign_names.name: Освященный Фонтан
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {W} или {U}.)
При выходе Освященного Фонтана на поле битвы, вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, он выходит на поле битвы повернутым.

foreign_names.flavor: 扩张眼线罗网的警戒中心。
foreign_names.name: 崇圣喷泉
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{W}或{U}。）
于崇圣喷泉进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则崇圣喷泉须横置进战场。

foreign_names.flavor: 擴張眼線羅網的警戒中心。
foreign_names.name: 崇聖噴泉
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{W}或{U}。）
於崇聖噴泉進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，則崇聖噴泉須橫置進戰場。

name: Hallowed Fountain
original_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
